name: Donut Rampage
description:
DESCRIPTION

Donut Rampage is a game in which you start as a small lil donut and work your way around a city, collecting dough and avoiding people as well as cars. You'll grow in different stages and with each stage your power grows with it. You can grow by collecting dough or alternatively, crushing cars.

People will damage you and reduce your size when you're vulnerable but will run away from you once you're
big enough.

Destroy buildings, crush cars, crush people and collect dough in order to gain as many points as possible before the timer runs out!

Developed for the weekly Game Jam (Week 153 Theme: "Roll")

CREDITS

Twitter: @MMufake

Twitter: @nick_dannenberg

Twitter: @JohnSk1221
Itch.io: https://updra.itch.io/

STAGES

Plain - Vulnerable to people and cars

Glazed - Bounce off cars, still vulnerable to people

Chocolate - Crush people and cars

White Chocolate - Destroy small buildings

Sprinkles - Destroy medium buildings

Raisins - Destroy large buildings

Hot Sauce - Destroy everything!

CONTROLS

W - Push forward

A - Push left
S - Push back
D - Push right

SPACEBAR - Jump (only available when small size)
Move Camera - Move your mouse (Character will move forward in the direction you aim)

Page and game will change overtime
